author: View All Posts Okogba
title: EFL Cup final: Mourinho to involve Rooney - Vanguard News
text:
Home » Sports » EFL Cup final: Mourinho to involve Rooney EFL Cup final: Mourinho to involve Rooney On 1:54 am In Sports by Okogba Comments 
M anchester United forward Wayne Rooney “will be involved” in tomorrow’s EFL Cup final against Southampton, says manager Jose Mourinho. 
Rooney, 31, announced on Thursday that he is staying at Old Trafford after being linked with a move to China. Wayne Rooney 
The England captain has missed United’s past three matches with a calf injury. 
“He is fine, he has been training with the team,” said Mourinho on Friday. “He made his statement about staying here exactly in the right moment.” 
The Portuguese added: “That should be the last question about it until the end of the season.” Okogba
